ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] going thru the archives....
ygData.msgSnippet: JM Capozzi (Kendrick) is an Verant employee now :)
ygData.messageBody:
JM Capozzi (Kendrick) is an Verant employee now :)

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Reece Tom R CPT 25 ID L G4(n)
> [mailto:g4mntofcr@...]
> Sent: Thursday, November 16, 2000 1:33 PM
> To: eqbards@egroups.com
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] going thru the archives....
>
>
> I remember this thread but can't remember who actually
> posted. Was it Absor
> who posted the reply? Or was it JM Capozzi (who we all
> thought was a Verant
> insider for a long time)?
>
> Galtin of E'ci
>
>
>
> Make of this what you will. Personally, I think that the
> first poster turned
> out to be a bit more correct in his predictions than the guy
> who answered
> him. And the scary thing is that the guy who answered him
> has since shed
> his "guise of the deceiver" and is now a VI employee. I
> really like the
> part about bards being able to heal more than clerics
> <snicker>. It just
> does not work that way in how this game gets played. To be
> fair - he may not
> have had much experience beyond level 45 at that point and
> with only "old
> world" zones - certainly does not seem to consider the
> current use of a main
> tank and complete heal that most everyone uses in combat.
>
> Sylly
>
> p.s. 1500 of the 1659 items are from June, July, August &
> September of '99 -
> the "good ole days."
>
>
> Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to
> lol@...
> with the subject submissions.
>
>
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
